overview: This memorable event from the ECW Arena features Terry Funk and Arn Anderson teaming up to take on Bobby Eaton and Sabu in the main event. The Bruiser Brothers and JT Smith unite against Shane Douglas, Mr. Hughes, and Public Enemy. Plus, 911 challenges Mikey Whipreck for the ECW World Television Title, Jimmy Snuka faces Kevin Sullivan, and more!
title: ECW When Worlds Collide
